summary: Global digital wallet and payment gateway platform (AXOPAY) with referral/reward system, supporting multi-currency transactions, ROI plans, binary matching engine, and comprehensive admin controls
architectural_notes: Multi-module architecture: Public Website, Client Portal, Admin Panel
Wallet engine handles balances, transfers, fees, and multi-currency conversions
ROI engine automates daily returns based on plan duration and percentage
Binary matching engine pairs left/right team volumes with daily limits and carry-forward logic
Reward engine triggers milestone-based payouts automatically
Three wallet types recommended: Main, Earnings, Withdrawal
Separate authentication flows for clients (OTP) and admins (2FA + optional IP restriction)
Security stack: HTTPS encryption, password hashing, 2FA, withdrawal verification, fraud monitoring, rate limiting

Implement ROI engine that automatically calculates and credits daily returns based on plan percentage (5% daily example) until plan expiry (30 days), crediting earnings to the Earnings wallet

Implement wallet engine in backend handling balance tracking for three wallet types (Main, Earnings, Withdrawal), internal transfers between users, transaction fees calculation, and currency conversion using configured exchange rates
